vocabInfos.lsjDefs: Epicurean , [variant datesAnthology Palantina; οἱ Ἐπ. the Epicureans , [Refs 2nd c.AD] (Middle Liddel)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
§ Epicurean, "of Epicurus"
an Epicurean, follower of the philosophy of Epicurus, Acts 17:18*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
彼古羅 这个形容詞在希腊文的意思是 "助手, 捍衛者"
哲學家伊比鳩魯派的人(享樂主義) (徒 17:18)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
彼古罗 这个形容词在希腊文的意思是 "助手, 捍卫者"
哲学家伊比鸠鲁派的人(享乐主义) (徒 17:18)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: Thuộc phái hưởng lạc; phái Khoái lạc; phái E-pi-cua. Xem G1947
